title: Optimizing Wound Culture Ordering in Electronic Health Records: A Case Report
details: JJ Hanna, JL Weon, K Kelton, E Haskell, MJ Ramirez… - Applied Clinical Informatics, 2025
abstract: Background: At a large quaternary health system, tissue specimens were frequently sent to the microbiology laboratory with an incorrect wound culture order meant for swab specimens due to poor electronic health record menu design. Wound cultures …
